```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
source("new_raw_processor.R")
tidy.dir <- out.dir
tidy.files <- paste(tidy.dir, n, "grams.txt", sep="")
```

```{r}
plots <- list()
for (II in n) {
	ngrams <- fread(tidy.files[II], sep=",")
	top <- ngrams[1:20, by=source]
	
	x.val <- ngrams$start
	if (II > 1) {
	  x.val <- paste(x.val, ngrams$end, sep="_")
	}
	plots[[II]] <- ggplot(ngrams, aes(x=x.val, y=count, fill=count)) + geom_bar(stat="identity") + facet_wrap(source~., nrow=3) + coord_flip() + theme(legend.position=element_blank()) + labs(x=paste(II, "gram", sep=""), y="count")
}
```
